name: Just Maze (itch) (Igor Konyakhin)
description:
Move with WASD, arrow keys don't work, because of the time limitations I set myself to make this game - I decided to do Brackeys 10 minute game challenge.

This maze game was made from scratch in just 8 minutes 23 seconds including:

  • Random maze generation
  • Art
  • Shader Graph
  • Lights and Shadows
  • Cinemachine
  • Trail

I recorded the entire process and I'll soon make a video about it (give me a couple days) and maybe also a tutorial about random maze generation, but for now you can watch how I made a game in just 1 minute (although a much simpler one) for the previous Low Effort game jam:
